SideMission.Side_Npc_Complete_HappySkill_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="e9cfaf3e4b4f4906998f265aa984126a" Scale="1"/]Help [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] become the best Rescue Pup he
can be. [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Train[System:Color name="Default"] him to unlock all of his skills.
As [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] improves, you're sure to improve
along with him!
SideMission.Side_Npc_Complete_Equipment_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="6965152d8d3341128ebe7df109af5314" Scale="1"/]Collect all the scientific wonders available at
the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] Lab[System:Color name="Default"]. I speak of my gear, of course! Once
you've equipped it all, you will truly understand
the greatness of science!
SideMission.Side_Npc_Complete_Equipment_01_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="d914a642746f4ae793acd58186392e0a" Scale="1"/]Acquire All Gear from the Lab
SideMission.Side_Npc_AddOtakaraZukan_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal04"/][UE:Meta key="d654189d849749acbc82f605e4fc86e9" Scale="1"/]Please allow me to appraise any and all
treasures you collect! My assessment of each
one will be published in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Treasure Catalog[System:Color name="Default"].
So please, do bring me any valuables you find.
SideMission.Side_Npc_AddPikuminNum_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal08"/][UE:Meta key="11b41b1a8a9348ccb3a4ae9ef8fced14" Scale="1"/]The universe and civilization itself could learn
a lot from Pikmin. Increase their numbers by
feeding the Onion or find wild Pikmin in caves
so our relationship with them can prosper!
SideMission.Side_Npc_UpdateExploreRate_Area_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="eca5cb8cbf554cb38a6e085b1274235f" Scale="1"/]Investigate each area until your progress
reaches 100 percent! Remember to explore
caves and collect all the treasure too. This
should be easy peasy for our star rookie.
SideMission.Side_Npc_UpdateExploreRate_Area_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="9f649c1532004c9a899cbccb808d28ba" Scale="1"/]Keep going until your progress for each area
hits 100 percent! Don't forget to explore caves
and collect treasures. You should be good
enough to do this in your sleep, rookie!
SideMission.Side_Npc_AddGenseiZukan_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal07"/][UE:Meta key="2e22d4196e984b82aa9556aeebed95b9" Scale="1"/]I'm excited to learn all about the creatures of
this planet. Let me know when you encounter
new species. It would be a dream come true to
record every last one in the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Piklopedia[System:Color name="Default"]!
SideMission.Side_Npc_AddPikminNum_Flower_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="d33ccca0654f4f9fa8f02b65678cc296" Scale="1"/]I would love for you to bloom all the Pikmin
flowers you can during your missions. If you
find any nectar, let the Pikmin enjoy it. Let's
fill this world with brilliant blossoms!
SideMission.Side_Npc_AddPikminNum_Flower_01_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="7fd30870881942e9a9aedc979fd955ed" Scale="1"/]Bloom a Bunch of Pikmin Flowers
SideMission.Side_Npc_Collect_Onyon_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="65a9f9c7e3f142daadefa5ac53b49a36" Scale="1"/]Onions are fascinating! An Onion will fuse with
other Onions, but it won't grow if it fuses with
Onions of the same color. So I need you to find
and collect [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Onions in all the different colors[System:Color name="Default"].
SideMission.Side_Npc_CollectLeaf_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal11"/][UE:Meta key="dc13c963194946c1a739ade29b67170c" Scale="1"/]There's nothing I'd like more than to meet one
of those leaf cuties...you know, the folks with
leaves on their heads. I'm sure they'll plant all
kinds of new creative ideas in MY head!
SideMission.Side_Npc_Collect_OnyonCarryBoost_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal13"/][UE:Meta key="28360e67bbd84b47aecbf7f01b726c9e" Scale="1"/]How awesome would it be to know how many
Pikmin you can lead in your squad at once?!
The more flarlic you collect, the closer we can
get to finding the answer!
SideMission.Side_Npc_Complete_BuildGimmick_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal17"/][UE:Meta key="4444b9d38b35408cac9d92e7dc3923a0" Scale="1"/]I'd like you to build a bunch of structures and
then report 'em to me. Think of it as helpin' out
a pal, OK? Don't you worry—I'll have some
rewards ready for you when you're done.
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_Instrument_01: [UE:Meta key="380484b64d7b48ddbc6bc754e4ba8509" Scale="1"/]Music of a Past Culture 1
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_Instrument_02: [UE:Meta key="d22d75fb69124ff6b7b11757cf0ef82e" Scale="1"/]Music of a Past Culture 2
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_Instrument_03: [UE:Meta key="f29c5cb0782f414ca65cf9f3ea83dcda" Scale="1"/]Music of a Past Culture 3
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_Instrument_01_:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal18"/][UE:Meta key="5cd41b170d7c4b2d86136513230032bc" Scale="1"/]Evidence suggests that past civilizations on
this planet had music, so they must have had
instruments to play it on! You must go out
and collect these instrument treasures for me.
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveClearNum_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf01"/][UE:Meta key="fbee610c674344fa96df389fe690f4b9" Scale="1"/]Someone needs to explore the caves on this
planet. I can't, so I need you to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]explore each
one until you arrive at an exit and reach the
surface[System:Color name="Default"]. I know you'll do well, my lucky pupil.
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveVSClearNum_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf02"/][UE:Meta key="33bb392a9b3f4ab2b47ad484a6e67c6c" Scale="1"/]The survival of society as we know it is in your
hands...and Dandori prowess! [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Take on more
Dandori Battles[System:Color name="Default"], and hone your skills.
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveVSClearNum_03_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="9b0dfe40182c4bff8972786eb43e6f3b" Scale="1"/]Get Gold in All Battles
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveVSClearNum_04_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="e4ab5418f977409e8beae9d6278bb599" Scale="1"/]Get Platinum in All Battles
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveSPClearNum_Plat01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="ac9d7574f931442a9694e7dedc5653b9" Scale="1"/]Strength and spirit alone aren't enough for an
adventure. You also need the ability to imagine
achieving the best Dandori outcomes. Take on
some battles, and polish your Dandori skills.
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveSPClearNum_Plat04_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="325b8759732448c79f44b0753b230acd" Scale="1"/]Get Gold in All Challenges
SideMission.Side_Npc_CaveSPClearNum_Plat05_Purpose: [UE:Meta key="eb587ac951e6456a86b6b15a22724ce9" Scale="1"/]Get Platinum in All Challenges
SideMission.Side_Npc_UnleafSurvivorLeaf_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Pilot"/][UE:Meta key="315e287cedf54cb09792bd56261bf263" Scale="1"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rescue[System:Color name="Default"] everyone who SPROUTED leaves like
me, and [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cure[System:Color name="Default"] them while you're at it!
SideMission.Side_Npc_BeatEnemyNum_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf05"/][UE:Meta key="814f8d0adad041369faf120a0664f7bd" Scale="1"/]This battle is between you and the planet.
Defeat the creatures you encounter, and you
win. It's that simple.
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_AllTourist_01_:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf06"/][UE:Meta key="7ef22c431ffc4ef1b647648e122d0ca9" Scale="1"/]Our company, Satella Travel, was here on our
Uncharted Planet Tour, and the passengers
all went missing! Please rescue our customers
and our freelance pilot.
SideMission.Side_Npc_QuestNpc_Collect_AllGeographyCl:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal12"/][UE:Meta key="afa5402b3d524e13a8bef590fcc1e8d1" Scale="1"/]Please find my [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]3 students[System:Color name="Default"] from the Alayon
Academy Planetary Science Club! Their names
are [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal14"/]Sheeba[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal16"/]Keesh[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal19"/]Kaia[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]. I can't bear the
thought of them stranded out there!
SideMission.Side_QuestNpc_Collect_AllResearchGroupt_:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf04"/][UE:Meta key="292d7baafe6e475d90a4d87865014304" Scale="1"/]Please find the other members of the research
group I came here with! Losing them would be
a blow for the entire galaxy. I really need you
to come through for me here.
SideMission.Side_QuestNpc_Collect_AllTVCrew_01: [UE:Meta key="45474b109bb74d29bf1d2ef34d8840c7" Scale="1"/]Find the Missing TV Crew
SideMission.Side_QuestNpc_Collect_AllTVCrew_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal15"/][UE:Meta key="2c7e4315eb8a447db721828b228bac70" Scale="1"/]Help! My TV crew needs to be found and
rescued. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal18"/]Frisé[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal20"/]Vonda[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], and my director... You
hunt for them, and I'll report from the sce—
What do you mean "it's too dangerous"?
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="c426dce5ba084fb2a0a46bad1cee60a3" Scale="1"/]Go find four Dwarf Bulborbs. They're super
yummy in stews and soups. I think I spotted
some at that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]something-something Hollows[System:Color name="Default"].
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="9e086fc5d9a94cfea548b86cf13b6cb6" Scale="1"/]I want two Yellow Wollyhops. If you grill their
legs till they're well-done, they make for a
crunchy snack. You can find them at that
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]blah-blah Courtyard[System:Color name="Default"], I think.
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="eaf6248d197747fca5048146e7e60d23" Scale="1"/]I'm hungry for one Peckish Aristocrab. But do I
want crab soup or crab skewers? Tough call.
Anyway, you can catch them at that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Resort
place[System:Color name="Default"]. Get to it.
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="a8d656f7743e492e86ee3aff25f3cb5f" Scale="1"/]I'm in the mood for one whole Fiery Bulblax.
Their eyes are the best part. You may be able
to find some in that cave called [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]something-
something the Beast[System:Color name="Default"].
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_05_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="f02b904164094dfcbe289ae5d5a26542" Scale="1"/]I need one Giant Breadbug. They're pretty
bland on their own, but maybe I can dress it up.
Go look for one at [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]"insert word here" Palace[System:Color name="Default"].
SideMission.Side_Npc_Louie_SideMission_06_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Louie"/][UE:Meta key="b5e5f9a97a094846a3940a6de49a10dd" Scale="1"/]Tonight, I'm in the mood for a Sovereign
Bulblax. I'll make it into a three-course meal.
I bet there will be one at the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]giant dog's den[System:Color name="Default"].
SideMission.Side_QuestNpc_Collect_RealEstate_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf09"/][UE:Meta key="10a03e27abc140cbac8d08e2f93026ef" Scale="1"/]Sorry to be a bother, but could you please
locate the president of our company and my
employer, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf13"/]Chowder[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]? I'm sure he's fine, but I'd
be so grateful for your assistance.
